vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 52, “Administrative Procedures for the Construction Codes,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 102.3, 302.2.1, and 306.1 (1) providing that permits and certificates of occupancy may be granted for certain structures located on a small lot, even if  the structure is not allowed by the development standards of the underlying zoning, if the project complies with the development standards for a small lot contained in Chapter 211, Subchapter D, of the Texas Local Government Code; (2) providing a penalty not to exceed $2,000.00; (3) providing a saving clause; (4) providing a severability clause; and (5) providing an effective date - Financing - This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
